The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 October is 777,774 (1,381.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 22 October, there were 122,224 new confirmed cases (217.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 October, there were 96,006 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 27% (26,218 extra cases).
